item.title: Nuclear power is having a moment: VanEck CEO
item.description: CEO Jan VanEck credits a global policy shift and the Trump administration's support for nuclear power which is making his ETF a winner this year.

item.title: Beer demand weakens, Corona and Modelo seller says
item.description: Constellation Brands cuts fiscal year outlook as the importer of Corona and Modelo faces declining beer sales amid challenging economic conditions and...

item.title: Nestlé CEO Laurent Freixe ousted over inappropriate workplace relationship with subordinate
item.description: Nestlé removes CEO Laurent Freixe over inappropriate workplace relationship and appoints Philipp Navratil as new chief executive officer.

item.title: Spirit Airlines files for second bankruptcy in under a year as low-cost carrier continues to struggle
item.description: Spirit Airlines enters the Chapter 11 restructuring process again while assuring customers that flights and services will continue operating normally.

item.title: Cracker Barrel's rebrand reversal follows financial struggles
item.description: Cracker Barrel is facing financial challenges with mixed sales results and tariff pressures as its CEO moves forward with a corporate transformation p...
